length ball punched through cover. Easy two and Kohli wanted a third, but was sent back by Jadeja. Rabada was jogging along the boundary from deep point, which made Kohli think a third was there
goes back and turns this to square leg
tossed up outside off, big stride out to defend
full, from over the wicket. Lands on leg stump and driven back to the bowler
length ball, on leg stump, clipped to deep midwicket
length ball, angling into his pads. Flicked to deep backward square
full, outside leg stump. Comfortably tapped away to backward square leg
length ball outside leg stump. Turning into his pads and worked into the gap at deep midwicket. Another 100 partnership
length ball, on middle. Swivels and guides it to midwicket
full on off stump. Turning away as he bat-pads a defensive shot
good length on middle, and whipped to deep midwicket. Kohli goes past Don Bradman's Test tally of 6996 runs
full, just outside off, and turning into his pads. Fended off the front foot
full, just outside off stump. Tapped back to the bowler
length ball outside off. Spinning into his pads and worked off his legs to midwicket
length ball, outside off, and punched to deep point. Nice, early call for the second run
tossed up outside leg stump. He guides a leg-side clip to deep midwicket
full, outside off stump. Pushed with the bat's open face to point. They walk across for one
length ball, outside leg stump. Punched back to Muthusamy
full, outside leg stump, and clipped fine past square leg. Comes back for the second run and that's his 7th Test double ton!
good length, on leg stump. Tapped back to the bowler
full, on middle. Flicked to square leg
good length, on middle. Nudged away
full, on off, and driven with the turn to long on
good length, on off, and he mistimes a cut to point
length ball, on middle stump. Guided with the turn to short fine leg
full on off stump, and he mistimes a slog to long on
full outside off stump. Driven with the turn to long on once again
full, just outside off stump. Blocked off the front foot
length ball, quick outside off stump. Backs away and cuts to deep point
half-tracker on middle, and he goes deep in his crease before hammering a pull over deep midwicket
length ball, on middle. Tapped back to the bowler. He's overstepped again!
full, outside off, and he opens the bat's face to guide a shot to short third man. Fielder recovers well after a misfield

Muthusamy gets Kohli again! But wait, he's overstepped! Length ball on off and he tried to cut, but edged straight to the diving Faf at first slip. Umpire Llong straightaway said he wanted to check for the no-ball, and there you go, a clear couple of inches beyond the popping crease. Wry smile on Kohli's face. The innings continues
full, on middle. Driven to long on
full, wide outside off, and he caresses a drive through the covers!
length ball outside off, and under-edged into the deck. Bounces into the keeper's gloves
full, on off stump. Whipped against the turn to deep midwicket
overpitched on off stump. Drilled to long on
full, outside off stump, and he skips down the ground before flaying an inside-out drive over the infield. Nearly carries to the fielder in the deep
full, just outside off stump. Driven to long on
good length, outside off stump. Cut to point
length ball, on off, and pulled over midwicket
good length on middle. He swivels and slogged to the deep backward square fence
length ball, outside off stump. Makes room and cuts in front of square. Maharaj - at deep cover - runs around the boundary line to intercept
length ball, outside off stump. Makes room and hammers a cut in front of square once again. Trods back for the second run and that's Jadeja's 12th Test fifty!
full, just outside off. Pushes at this, but edged to short third man instead. And now Jadeja does his sword celebration after realizing he's reached fifty
length ball, on middle. Punched back to Markram. Expensive over
full, on off stump. Clears his front leg and clobbers a shot to long on for four
length ball, outside off. Makes room to cut but misses out completely
full, outside off, and flayed over cover. Mistimed, and therefore, long on comes around to cut it off
length ball on off. Goes deep, and punches to long on
fullish, just outside off. Opens the bat's face and runs it down to deep point. Partnership now 150

length ball, outside off, and he mistimes a cut. Du Plessis - at first slip - dives to his right but the ball goes between him and the keeper on this occasion. Muthusamy had overstepped again but the umpire didn't call it a no-ball
full on off stump. He skips down the wicket and then muscles a six over long on. Easy peasy...
length ball on off. Pulled with the turn to deep midwicket
full, outside off, and he skips down the ground before muscling an inside-out six over deep extra cover!
good length on middle. Makes room and flat-bats a shot to midwicket
elite whippage! Full, on off, and he uses his bottom hand to hammer a whippy shot past long-on's right
good length, outside off. Makes room and cuts this past the diving point fielder. Maharaj concedes 21
length ball, outside off. Makes room and flat-bats a shot past the diving cover fielder
length ball, outside off stump. Opens the bat's face and runs it down to short third man
length ball, on off stump. Punched to long on
full, just outside off. Toe-ends a slog, but still clears the long on fence! They're now toying with the SA spinners
length ball on middle. Skidding across, and guided to short third man
length ball on off. Makes room and cuts square to deep point. Session run-rate in excess of 9 now
length ball, wide outside off, and cut square to deep point
full, just outside off stump. Tapped to cover
good length on off. Punched to long on
length ball on middle, turning down the leg side, and he guides it off his hips to fine leg for a triple
length ball, just outside off stump. Cut fine past short third man, and Kohli runs back for the second
length ball, outside off stump. Punched to cover
full, just outside off stump. Defended towards cover
length ball on off stump. Mistimed to mid-on off the back foot
length ball, outside off and turning further away. Cut square to deep point. Hundred runs in the session in just 12+ overs
full and wide. Jadeja skips down the ground and wedges a shot to mid-off
full, on leg stump. Clipped off his pads to the fine-leg fence, but Faf gives the ball a mighty chase to save one run
full, on off stump. Defended towards short cover
full, on off stump. Driven to long on for a single
full, just outside off, and clobbered over the bowler's head! No stopping that
length ball outside off stump. Cut off the back foot to deep point
appeal for caught behind but not given. Length ball outside off, and Kohli misses the cut
full and wide outside off stump. Kohli slaps it to cover
delicate late cut to short third man for a single. Only two away from equaling his highest Test score of 243 v Sl
full on middle, and drilled past the bowler to long on
length ball, outside off and angling further away. Cut away to deep point
full outside off and turning further away as he tries to drive. Kohli misses altogether but Faf dives to his left to stop the bye-four
length ball on off, and clobbered to deep midwicket. That's Kohli's highest Test score! Just four away from 250
length ball, outside off. Tapped to cover
length ball outside off, and cut to point for a quick run
full on leg stump. Clipped to short fine leg
low full toss, wide outside off. Slapped to long on
length ball, outside off, and guided to short third man. Kohli has now tied with Sachin Tendulkar's highest Test score
full, on off, and he comes down the wicket before hammering a shot to long on
full, on middle, and whipped to wide long on That's Kohli's 250! Dugout on their feet
full and wide outside off. Driven to wide long off for a single
thrown up wide of off, but  he mis-times the slap, the ball goes to cover
flatter on the stumps, nudged to midwicket

caught at long-off down the track and he splices this in the air, goes towards long-off rather than straight, and de Bruyn takes a comfortable catch having taken a few steps forward. No century for Jadeja
some zip from Ishant first up, going across Elgar with good carry, he lets it go outside off
fuller but closer to off stump too and he pats it into the offside
length ball going across him, which is Ishant's natural angle. Comfortable leave
and draws the edge first up, with Elgar driving away from the body with hard hands. Flies off the leading edge to point's left. Jadeja the fielder there, hares after it and pulls it in
length on a fifth stump line, left alone
fuller on off, driven back but Ishant fields on his follow through
nice line, in the channel on a length and Markram shoulders arms

plumb in front Umesh strikes second ball on his comeback with a wicked inswinger. Markram played completely down the wrong line, all around it, as Umesh gets it to bend back in and rap him on the pads. Looked out in real-time and the umpire doesn't take long to raise the finger. Markram walks off without reviewing
another inswinger, fuller this time, defended from the crease
tight line on off stump, with a hint of movement away this time, he gets behind it and defends
and this one bends back in, Umesh showing some real skill with the ball. The batsman gets an inside edge onto boot off his punch
swings in this time, but ends up on the pads and he nudges it towards mid-on to get off the mark
yorker into middle stump, he jams it out by getting his bat down in time
fuller on off, pushed back to the bowler
length ball on off, angling into him, gets behind it and defends
very full, almost yorker length but wide of off, he gets down low and pats it back
length outside off, squirted towards point
strays on the pads and Elgar picks it off smoothly, good timing to send it to the deep square leg fence
length in the channel, left alone
too short outside off, sits up and he transfers weight back and punches through cover. Super shot
oh that's a shooter. Kept really low and bounced well in front of Saha. Back of a length outside off and luckily for de Bruyn it wasn't in line with the stumps
length on off, defended carefully towards cover. Played softly enough that they can get a quick single

He's played on! Elgar ended up in all kinds of a tangle on whether to play or leave it. Great lines from Umesh, drawing the indecision. In the channel and he's already shown he can move this new ball both ways. Elgar thinks he ought to play it, then decides against it, but is too late to withdraw his bat. The ball straightens a touch, takes the inside edge, drops on boot and clatters onto stumps
snorter to greet him first up and he does well to keep it down from in front of his grille
creamed through the covers. Too full, half volley outside off and he leans into a textbook cover drive, sends it purring to the boundary
fuller on off, defended to mid-off
back of a length outside off, he lets it go
length ball moving in a touch, but dealt with well, as he brings down a straight bat to punch this past the bowler, to mid-on's left

is that caught down the legside? That looked like a one-day wide, and Bavuma wanted to glance that fine. Gets a thin edge on it, and Saha pulls off an absolutely spectacular take, diving full stretch to his left to pluck the ball. The umpires are going upstairs to check. And replays show that it does have an edge, but it hit the ground right after, so it's a bump ball. But what a take from Saha! He flew through the air to his left to gather. Bavuma would have been filthy with himself if he had gotten out to that ball
length on the stumps, defended
back of a length rising up outside off, he gets on his toes to defend and keep it down
too straight and too full, easy pickings for de Bruyn. Magnificently played flick, shows his wrist power, as he sends it to the deep midwicket boundary

oh that's skilfully played too. Short outside off, but didn't rise as much as he though, but he adjusted well to steer it through backward point. Didn't move his feet but timed it to perfection, just stuck his bat out and guided it
length outside off, defended
back of a length in the channel, covers the line and lets it go
length outside off again, on the fifth stump, he shoulders arms again
length on off, gets behind it and pushes it towards cover
down leg again, kicks a bit after pitching back of a length. The batsman doesn't connect with his leg glace. Saha does well again to move quickly to his left and gather
fuller on off, stands tall and drives it to mid-on
too full, Ishant hasn't really found his length so far, and this is a peach of a shot from de Bruyn, who off-drives elegantly for another boundary
back of a length on the stumps, punched to mid-on
too full again and off-driven smoothly, but straight to mid-off that time
some zip away from the batsman, pitches full outside off and moves a fair bit. He's not playing at that though
back of a length on off, gets inside the line and punches to cover
fullish length outside off, guides it to point
outside edge this time and doesn't carry to Kohli at third slip. He does well to dive to his right and stop it. Hard length in the channel and Bavuma ends up poking at it
back of a length outside off in the channel, defended
some movement away, and he thought he had the room outside off to drive, ends up rolling off the inside edge to the bowler's right
fuller outside off, defended on the front foot
leading edge falls safe He was looking to turn it to the legside but the ball loops up over silly point
fuller, gets a stride out to defend
skids through outside off and he leaves it alone
draws him on the front foot again to defend solidly outside off
edged but Rahane indicates immediately it didn't carry to him at slip. He was coming forward again, but this time Jadeja got it to spin past the bat enough to take a thin edge

huge appeal for caught behind and not given. Kohli has opted to review. Back of a length, moving away a touch in the channel, gets him to follow the ball with his hands. The ball climbing as it passed him possibly drew him into following it, couldn't adjust quickly enough to drop his hands. And DRS shows a spike as the ball passes bat so Shami has struck first ball! And an excellent first ball it was too, rearing up from a length all the way to the keeper. Saha was appealing vociferously immediately.
In-ducker beats him comprehensively and hits his pad. Another huge appeal but this time they don't review. Possibly going down leg.
and a bouncer to the nightwatchman who ducks under it

and that's too good for the nightwatchman. Gloves it to the keeper, but Nortje has reviewed this. And replays show why he's reviewed it, it actually went off his bicep. Bat and gloves were close together so the noise that was heard could have fooled the umpire into thinking it was one of them. Pitched back of a length and moving away, but while the bowler and fielders were celebrating, Kohli from slip indicated that the batsman hadn't got an edge
length ball into him, defends
full outside off, lunges forward and defends
on middle stump this time, stretches out to defend again
pulls his length back a bit and Nortje goes deep in his crease to defend
stays still this time and punches this length ball towards cover
good leave, pitched outside off and if there is turn will go only further away so he shoulders arms
another good leave, as this one is quicker and zips through outside off
back of a length into him, keeps it down, defending from his mid-riff
caught on the crease to this length ball on off, but he manages to get bat on it, inside edges onto pad

Mayank Agarwal gets a hand to it at fourth slip but can't hold on. Shami draws the edge from an awkward fend-prod by Nortje, which flies towards the slips. Too late to react was Agarwal and can't hold on. Tough chance, that ball was travelling fast, but it will go down as a drop
on leg stump, flicked to square leg
zips past his outside edge again. Back of a length and outside off, but he's keeping bat close to body and doesn't let it wander out into a poke
yorker on middle stump, he keeps it out, defending towards cover
length on off, defended
shortens his length slightly, and gets it to spin a bit, but he hangs back and defends
length on the stumps, defended from the crease
flatter on the fourth stump, chopped to point
nice stride out to defend
fuller on off, defended
length ball nipping in, he jabs it away back towards the bowler
bouncer, but going down leg and he ducks under it without major discomfort
back of a length, good carry past the batsman outside off
another one that kicks off a length and wobbles after pitching. Back of a length outside off, but Saha gathers it well past leg stump
fuller on off, gets fully behind it to block
length ball coming into him, he tucks it backward of square
speared into him, he defends on the front foot
quicker one, drags it shorter, but he's not going to go for it, just gets behind it and blocks
fuller, he gets a stride out and defends. Loses balance a bit but doesn't get into trouble
length outside off, spinning away, he lets it go
speared in on off stump, he smothers it with his front foot defence
another full ball on off, defended on the front foot
nice and full, starts outside off and curves back in so very late, de Bryun presses forward and lets it go. It wasn't too far away from off stump
back of a length and zipping through outside off, Shami nearly hits 140ks, no shot once again
pitched further up and swinging in, but Shami gets it too straight, de Bryun presses forward, nice stride and drives it smoothly between midwicket and mid-on for four
good length and largely holds its line outside off, forward and run away to point with an open face
starts outside off and swings back in, but does so after passing the batsman, who had let it go in the channel
good length and speared outside off, not close enough to off stump to draw a shot from de Bruyn
full and slanting into off stump, Nortje covers up in defence
even fuller and swings back in, Umesh has Nortje falling over the leg-side flick, but this surely heading down leg with the sharp angle and inswing
full and on a fifth-stump line outside off, Nortje has a dip at it, does so with soft hands, ensuring the ball doesn't carry to gully
full and sprayed on the pads, competently clipped away to long leg for a single
full and attacking the stumps, de Bryun deploys a good stride and drives with a straight bat to mid-on
good length on off, de Bruyn plants his front foot and middles another drive, finds mid-on once again
136.2ks lifter outside off, sails through to Saha, as Nortje ducks out of the way. The ball swerved away late, but good take from Saha

Shami has bounced out the nightwatchman! Short and kicks up outside off, Nortje is caught in a tangle. He hops and fends at it as opposed to avoiding it, and offers a catch to fourth slip. Kohli dives low to his right and grabs it with both hands

Faf nearly drags on first ball. Shami hits a hard length and gets it to slant back in just a shade outside off. Faf is caught in two minds - whether to leave or fend at it. He does a bit of this, a bit of that, and sends a thick inside edge past leg stump
much tighter from Faf. Good length and homing in at off, presses forward and defends
back of a length and snaking back in from outside off, but does not threaten off, no shot
good length and slanting back in from outside off once again, Faf shows restraint and shoulders arms
full and angling in at of stump, defended tightly to the covers
good length, threatens to angle in, then straightens away outside off, ignored
good length and outside off, de Bruyn stretches out to meet the pitch, then push-drives it to the left of extra-cover
Shami brings the short midwicket into place with this incoming ball, which is clipped to the right of that fielder
short and outside off, de Bryun jumps back in the crease, stands up tall and flays it straight to extra-cover
good length and straightens away outside off, de Bryun covers his off stump and ignores it
good length and swerves back in so very sharply from outside off, the ball just about bounces over the off bail as Faf lets it go. Another dangerous leave from the SA captain
full on middle, clipped away with the angle through square leg
full and holds its line outside off, no shot from Faf
short and kicks up at off stump, Faf diffuses it in fuss-free fashion
back of a length, threatens to angle in towards off, then straightens away outside off, more confident leave from Faf
banged in short and angling in at off, 143.4ks, Faf gets right behind the line and blocks back to Shami
short and holds its line outside off, de Bruyn rises on top of the bounce and firmly punches to the left of short cover
full and tailing in at off stump, played back to the bowler
shorter and slants in at off stump, punchily defended back to Umesh
keeps it short, shifts the line slightly wider, de Bryun rides the bounce and dabs to point with soft hands
full and attacking off stump, 137.3ks, defended back to Shami

WHAT.A.CATCH from Saha! He flies to his right and grabs it with both hands right in front of first slip. Umesh hits that in-between length and gets it to straighten away. A crease-bound de Bruyn aims to punch through the covers - he has played this shot well until now - but winds up stabbing at the ball and nicks it off. Over to you, Saha
very full and sliding back in, defended off the back foot to the leg side
fullish and outside off, no shot
another good take from Saha, takes this right in front of his nose. Shami runs in hard, hits the deck harder, the batsman ignores it
Shami ventures wide of the crease, gets it to tail in at off stump, Faf keeps it out
back of a length and just a shade outside off, Faf gets behind the line and blocks
full and homing in at off, Faf hangs back in the crease and dead-bats it away
Umesh draws an uppish drive from de Kock. Pitched up, de Kock drives fairly early and scoops it to the right of cover

belted through the line! Slightly overpitched and outside off, de Kock leans into it, gets closer to the pitch and nails it away to the right of mid-off. Cover was left over and de Kock takes advantage of it
pitched up and outside off, driven to mid-off off the front foot
short and angling across off, nothing doing from de Kock
short on middle, 137ks, de Kock jumps across and fends it away to the leg side
good length on off, forward and defensively tapped to cover
back of a length and wide of off, no shot
back of a length and on the pads, tucked away to long leg
good length, angling away, swinging away outside off, bounces through to Saha as de Kock is defeated on the drive
back of a length and slanting away outside off, got to get it closer to off to draw a shot from de Kock
full and targetting the stumps, pushed off the front foot to mid-off
good length and on middle and leg, stabbed off the back foot to short midwicket
and he finds some purchase right away. Good length and breaks back in defended
full and goes straight on outside off, Faf prods at it and plays with soft hands past slip's right
full on middle, defended with the break to short leg
dropped shorter and turns in on off, jabbed away to cover
slower through the air and Ashwin finds turn again, Faf goes for a sweep despite the presence of deep square leg and misses
good length and breaks back in, defended from the crease
really full on off and middle, sliced away wide of point
pitched up and outside off, Faf gets forward and square-drives it away to the right of backward point
short and angling in at off, Faf fends it off
full and on a fourth-stump line, push-driven only as far as mid-off
back of a length, threatens to angle in, then straightens outside off, no shot

edged but du Plessis gets away. Nicked into the ground, the ball rolls away between second slip and gully. Much fuller, angling in at off, moves away, du Plessis prods at it, but the ball doesn't carry
full and on off, pushed through to the off side
dangled up on off, not much turn, defended
slider on middle stump, no turn again, de Kock collapses his back leg, manufactures some swinging room and laces it away past silly-point, and Jadeja at cover
flatter and faster, poses a threat to the stumps, de Kock jams it back to Ashwin
De Kock makes room once again and drives straighter to mid-off this time
looped up at off and breaks away, de Kock keeps it out
length outside off, left alone
length ball, angling in on off stump, he gets behind it and defends
length ball going with the angle but ends up on the pads, easily tucked away to fine leg
going across him and moving further away, left alone
length outside off on the fifth stump, lets it go
back of a length brings it closer to the stumps and de Kock defends from the crease
tossed up on off, he plants his front foot forward but doesn't go hard at the ball, defends with soft hands and squirts it gently to short third man
edged and goes for four. Goes in the region of fourth slip or gully, but there's no fielder there. Went for the drive off a flighted one outside off and got the edge. Ashwin has his hands on his head
flighted, comes on the front foot and drives to mid-off
tossed up on the stumps, patted back to the bowler
tossed up but nice dip on the batsman, and de Kock was making room to go inside out but adjusts well to offer a solid forward block
nudged towards square leg on the front foot
nice looking backfoot punch through cover. Was given the space to play that thanks to the length, which was a tad short
strays on leg, and clipped away but midwicket is in place to gather
fuller on off, driven to cover
almost under-edges it onto the stumps. Given some room outside off but not short enough to cut, he goes for it and the under-edge bounces close to off stump on the way to the keeper
angling into him on a length, on off, defended solidly from the crease
length ball angling into him, and that's some terrific timing by de Kock. Waited for it and opened the face of the bat to steer it through backward point. No fielder there so it goes all the way
tossed up on the stumps, defended
given air again, dips on him and Faf stays in his crease and defends gently towards short leg
fuller, defended on the front foot
good length, gives the ball some revs does Ashwin and you can almost hear it whirring through the air. Defended from the crease
length on the stumps, worked to midwicket

beaten on the drive and strikes his pads. Huge appeal by bowler and fielders. They're debating whether to take the review or not, but Saha seems to suggest height may be an issue so Kohli doesn't take it. Great ball, tossed up, dipping and turning from outside off. Faf thinks he has the line covered but the turn defeats him
fuller on the stumps, defended
punched firmly back to the bowler's left
nice tight line, stump to stump, he goes deep in his crease and offers the full face to defend back to the bowler
gets some shape away from the left-hander and de Kock gets low to drive, but mis-times it to cover
back of a length outside off, slashed to point
glorious shot. Full outside off and he flashes into a cover drive, finishes with a flourish in the follow through and sends the ball racing away
speared in full on the stumps, defended on the front foot
hammered That's almost disdainful treatment of Jadeja. Big stride out and he lofts the straight drive well and true, over the sightscreen
tossed up a mite more and wider of off, solid forward defensive
quicker on the stumps, defended on the front foot
skids through on a length, but he covers it well and defends towards point
drags it shorter and he goes back and whips through midwicket
oh that's taken off from a length and Saha has to get his face out of the way as he collects the ball. Outside off and Faf has left it alone
loses his line, too far down leg. He tries to flick it away but it's a little too far down leg to connect
back of a length but well outside off, he's not interested in getting bat anywhere near that
played down the wrong line and gets a thick outside edge that rolls to point. Might have been some reverse on that ball, swinging into him on the stumps
flicked off his pads imperiously through midwicket. Lovely seam position by Shami but line is wrong, and it ends up on the pads, too full moreover, and easy pickings for Faf

down leg side again, clips his pad on the way to Saha, who dives to his left for another good take/save. He's been pulling those off regularly in this Test, and quietly been having a great comeback series himself.
too full outside off and he forces a square drive that trickles to the boundary. No fielder there so even though the ball was losing momentum, there was nobody to pull it back in
brings it closer to the stumps due to that shot, and a bit shorter, de Kock goes back and tucks backward of square
fuller and Faf takes a big stride out and drives inside out to long-off
fuller outside off, comes on the front foot and pats it to short midwicket
length outside off, comes on the front foot and clips to short midwicket
fuller and straighter, worked off his front pad into the legside
fetches the sweep from outside off and nails it well, but there is a fielder at deep square leg
too straight and can't do that with that field, he just has to turn it to the leg-side where there are vast gaps to get off strike
skilfully done Brings out the sweep again and gets this finer. There is a fine leg but Faf has hit it powerfully and there's no chance to cut it off
fuller, big stride out to defend
length ball, stays in his crease that time and blocks it
wider outside off, and it spins into him, he stays on the back foot and punches to long-on
jabs at this one from deep inside his crease and sends it wide of the second slip for four. Not perhaps exactly where he wanted it to go
fuller on off, goes on the front foot to defend
speared in and defended
drags it slightly short and du Plessis stays back to force a punch, but doesn't time it
lovely shot. Stayed so still and balanced, spotted the opportunity to come on the front foot to an over-pitched ball and drives to cover's right. Ball travels smoothly to the fence
and now he beats the man at cover to his left to raise a fine fifty. Similar shot, but more muscle and less timing, and he opened the face of the bat more, using his wrists, to get another boundary
some bit off the pitch outside off and Saha gathers it while it's rising
nudged towards square leg
fuller around off, defended with a big stride out
tossed up, too full and de Kock on-drives with authority, beating the man at mid-on to send it screaming to the fence

beauty from Ashwin That's knocked over the stumps. De Kock is hanging around, thinking Saha's gloves knocked the bails off, but it was all Ashwin's doing. Tossed up, making him thinking about planting the front foot again perhaps, dips beautifully on him, and de Kock is caught on the crease, feet not moving. Pitches on middle and leg, and spins past a limply hanging bat to knock off the bails. Brilliant.
fuller on off, defended confidently towards point
flatter, skidding through outside off
fuller, patted towards cover
fuller on the leg stump, defended on the front foot
speared in to middle and leg, defended
given a bit more air than his normally flatter ones, but full enough for du Plessis to defend comfortably on the front foot
and that spins past the outside edge once again. Muthusamy was going back and deep in his crease but ends up jabbing the air
overthrows go to the boundary. Driven to mid-off and they set off for a quick single. Umesh fires in a throw, Ashwin doesn't gather, Shami backing up doesn't either.
fuller on off, nudged off the front foot to fine leg. Muthusamy wants the single, Faf seems unhappy about the calling has his arms stretched out but jogs through
squirts a thick outside edge through gully
fuller on the stumps, defended on the front foot
almost defeated by the sweep. Faf has played that to Ashwin successfully, but this time the ball is not quite full enough to execute and he doesn't connect. It whizzes past him and the stumps
length outside off, he goes across to wear it on his pads

diving effort at short midwicket by Kohli but the ball doesn't stick. Fuller and he tried to go across and clip it, gets it in the air. Kohli gets a full hand to it diving to his right but the ball pops out. Tough one but it will go down as a drop
defended on the front foot, gets a thick inside edge that rolls past short leg
moving across but Jadeja fires it on leg stump, he adjusts well enough to offer a full face in defence with back leg stretched out beyond off stump
fuller on off, stretches out to pad it away
defended more comfortably this time, getting right behind the line and blocking it
length outside off, gets into a defensive position early and pats it down
fuller, turned into the legside
full on off, tapped to long-on to jog through for a single
nice drift into the left-hander, and spins away but Muthusamy is solid in defence
held its line but he comes on the front foot with bat close to pad and gets it on the pad
jaffa. that pitched on a length and spat up, whizzing past his outside edge with vicious spin, thudding into Saha's gloves.
flatter and speared on off stump, jabbed down to long-off for one
pushed through outside off, Muthusamy hides his bat behind the pad and kicks it away
slides in with the arm from over the stumps, Muthusamy inches forward and inside-edges onto the pad
another one that rolls on off, blocked on off stump
tossed up and spins in at off stump, Muthusamy defends it back to Jadeja
slower through the air and just a shade outside off, hint of turn for Jadeja, blocked to the leg side with soft hands
full and spins in on off, whisked to short midwicket with the break
dangled up outside off, Faf doesn't reach the pitch and miscues a drive to mid-off
Faf shuffles across off and blocks a length-ball offbreak to short leg
tossed on a fourth-stump line, defended back to the bowler
swept flat and hard from off stump to deep square leg
good length and angling in from round the stumps, dinked to the leg side for one
pushed through on off stump, Muthusamy gets forward and defends confidently

big turn for Jadeja, and umpire Llong gives it out lbw rather belatedly. Muthusamy chats to his captain and reviews the on-field out decision. Good length, pitches outside off and breaks back in sharply, Muthusamy offers no shot and simply pads up to it. Threatening off stump, and yes the tracker suggests it would have clattered into off stump. Impact was outside off, but Muthusamy wasn't offering a shot here. SA continue to collapse around Faf
skids in on top of off, flapped away into the leg side
flighted and outside off, forward and defended to silly-point
quick fizzer from Jadeja, 96.3ks, runs past the bat as Philander flashes and misses
tossed up and spinning in on a fourth-stump line, defended back
more flight, drops on off, defended off the front foot
Faf jumps back to defend a full offbreak on middle
slides on outside off, Faf defends with soft hands, running the ball away to the right of slip
spins in at off, defended with the break to short midwicket
Faf closes the face and works this full ball to short leg
top ball from Jadeja! Full, drifts in at off, Philander feels for it and is beaten on the outside edge by spin
straighter one on off, dead-batted away
flatter abd darted wider of off, left alone
good length and just a shade outside off, blocked to silly-point off the front foot
flighted and outside off, driven to extra-cover
back of a length and holds its line outside off, ignored
tossed up and spins in on middle, blocked to short leg by Faf
overpitched and outside off, driven through the line to mid-off
clipped with the break through the vacant spaces in front of square on the leg side
shorter and flatter outside off, not much turn or drift, blocked off the back foot
flighted and drops on off, dead-batted away
tossed up and sliding in on off, defended with bat-pad close together
fuller and around off, blocked
looped up higher outside off, Faf takes on Jadeja and shovels it over mid-on for four
flighted on off, defended off the front foot
fired outside off, spin of the fast variety, left alone
fizzing arm ball from Jadeja. He spins around for an lbw shout and falls on the floor. Faf jabs at it and inside-edges it onto bat. Jadeja has been warned for stepping onto the middle of the pitch
ripping turn for Jadeja! Pushed through outside off and snakes away past Faf's drive. Rahane takes the ball with one hand to his left, but no bat involved
tossed up and drifting away past the outside edge as Philander plays inside the line of it
good length and on a fourth-stump line, 90ks, Philander hangs back and plays it back to the bowler
was that a carrom ball? Looks like it, Philander gets forward and keeps it out
lobbed up outside off, stabbed back, Ashwin stretches to his right and half-stops the ball
Philander is itching to get off the mark, but his captain sends him back. Jabbed into the covers, Ashwin hunts the ball down as Philander undoes his steps. Philander scoreless after 19 balls
drifts in at off stump, Faf bends forward and defends
pushed through outside off, Faf blocks off the front foot once again
tossed up slower and breaks away outside off, driven through the covers with a bigger stride
Jadeja is a popgun firing darts, blocked on off stump
slides on outside off, Philander dead-bats it away
Philander finally gets off the mark with a drive down the ground. First runs for Philander off his 22nd ball
good length and spins in, defended back
pushed through just outside off, defended back
flatter and just a shade outside off, defended off the back foot
good length and drifts away outside off, stabbed to point
shorter on off, jammed to the right of short leg
dangled up outside off and drifts away, no shot
shorter and outside off, punched through the covers off the back foot
flatter and outside off, played up to the covers
pushed through on off, blocked once again
shorter and spins away outside off, cut off the back foot to backward point
tossed up on middle, Philander presses forward and blocks
slider on middle, defended to the right of silly-point
fuller on off, driven with a straight bat down to long-on
slid through on off, Philander dead-bats it away
too full and too straight, picked off to the left of short midwicket for four. SA pass 150
shorter and spins in at off, blocked to the leg side off the back foot
shortish and spins back in, cramps Philander for room, stabbed to cover
flatter and just a shade outside off, defended from the crease
flayed through the cover-point region
slid in on middle, Philander inches forward and blocks to silly-point
back of a length and outside off, opens the face and jabs to point
fired outside off, drilled to mid-off off the front foot
full and drifts in on off, pushed back to the bowler on the bounce
slider on off, jammed to silly-point's right
floated up on off stump, defended back to Rohit
flatter and drifts away outside off, sliced to cover
Faf closes his face and blocks to the leg side
shuffles across and defends to the leg side once again
tossed just a shade outside off, dead-batted away
short, starts outside off and turns in, Faf gets behind the line in defence
flat and spins in on off, Philander camps back and defends
darted outside off, belted away to the left of extra-cover, Ishant slides rather belatedly and the ball skedaddles away to the fence
jammed to mid-off
fired on off, forward and defended to the off side
tossed up and angling across off, too full, Philander gets underneath the length and drills it straight of mid-off for another four
flighted on off, driven back to the right of the bowler
slides in on middle, played back
fired on off, defended again
slower and turns away outside off, scythed to extra-cover
darted on off, kept out
knocked into the midwicket region
pushed through outside off, whisked away to the left of short cover
Ashwin gives this loads of air and gets it to spin back in, Faf is late to bring his bat down and struck in front of off the appeal is shot down. Perhaps, he got an inside edge onto it
pushed through on off, knocked to short midwicket
Ashwin finds the outside edge this time, and Rahane snaps up the catch at slip. This one goes straight just outside off - as opposed to breaking in - Faf jabs at it and nicks it off
good length and drifts away past the outside edge
slider on off, kept out
fuller and spins back in, Maharaj prods forward in defence
fuller on off, Philander stays leg-side of the ball and stabs it away to the left of cover
chipped in the air but does not carry to short cover or mid-off
arrowed into the leg stump, glanced away so very fine on the leg side for four
darted on leg, squeezed to short cover
full on middle, Maharaj is forward and across to defend it
tossed on middle, blocked back to the bowler
fuller on the stumps, defended
tossed up outside off, blocked on the front foot
keeping it full and flighted on off and Philander happy to block those
back of a length outside off, goes back and punches to deep extra cover
skids through a bit, and he stays on the back foot to jab it away in defence
straightens the line marginally, but Maharaj goes deep in his crease and plays it off his pads towards leg slip
full on the stumps, driven back to the bowler
length ball, a touch slower, pushed towards point
flighted onto the middle stump, but he stretches forward and defends
speared in flatter on middle stump, but still full enough to defend on the front foot
turned off his front pad to short fine leg
fuller outside off, lunges forward to defend
nice loop on middle stump, he was hanging back and just about gets bat behind ball to defend
fuller, and he clips firmly on the legside but Kohli anticipates well at short mid-on and dives to field
flighted on the stumps, turned off the front foot to square leg
flighted outside off, pushed away
dips and drifts into him and turns further in that direction, jabbed to leg slip
goes straight on! Maharaj saved because he was playing inside the line with bat sticking to pad. It whistles past the outside edge
length ball, nipping in, jabbed into the legside
back of a length in the channel, tries to slash it, but it's moving inwards and he can only chop it down and back towards the bowler
back of a length, tailing in a bit again, but defended solidly from the crease
in that probing channel again, and hint of movement inwards, punched to extra cover
tailing into him again, very full, clipped to Ashwin at mid-on and they set off for a quick run
length on off stump, stays well back and jabs it away in defence
full angling across off, defended from the crease
tossed up around off again, defended
gets the line a mite straighter but the batsman solid in defence with a straight bat
length on leg, clipped towards square leg
fuller on off, driven towards mid-off
floated up on off, he strides forward to defend
nipping in outside off but left alone.
sharp movement off the seam into the batsman, and hits him on the thigh pad
bouncer, but going over leg stump and he ducks under it
and proper reverse now, tailing into the batsman. He was intent on leaving it, and does, but that wasn't extremely far from off stump
quick one going into him from slightly wider of the crease, it hits the back of his thigh pad as he's moving across to glance it and runs down fine. Defeats Saha's dive to his left
length on off, gets behind the line and offers a straight bat defence
floated up outside off, flat-bat driven through extra cover
tossed up but on the pads and he nudges it softly between mid-on and midwicket
drifts in a bit and he's trying to clip it square but gets a leading edge that rolls towards point
fuller on the stumps, defended to cover
speared into him, pushed to short cover
length ball on off, spins away, he plays with the turn to punch into the offside
full outside off and he goes down on one knee and square drives it with panache through backward point
wider outside off and he lets it go
back of a length around off and he goes on his toes to defend this from the crease
goes for the swinging yorker, slightly off target outside leg stump. He misses the flick and is struck on the pads, but that's going down
length ball in the channel and coming in, pushed away from close to his body to extra cover
tailing into him again, full on off, he goes low and uses bottom hand and wrists to drive to extra cover
tossed up around off, pushed to cover
length ball on off, stays in his crease and punches into the offside
fuller on off, comes nicely forward to smother it
straighter line that time, on middle but Philander equal to it and shows a full face while punching it back
full outside off, defended down the pitch
length outside off, he lets it go
fuller on the stumps, clipped to long-on
length on leg stump, tucked to square leg
fuller on off, takes two steps forward to block it
nicely tossed up and he plays slightly down the wrong line due to the drift, and gets a thin inside edge that drops short of short leg
defended on the front foot
tossed up outside off, stretches forward to defend
tossed up on leg stump, bunted back to the bowler
fuller on leg stump, steers it towards point with an angled bat
sticking to his leg stump line, and Philander is getting his pad out in front beside the ball and defending with his bat
slightly straighter on middle and leg, defended
fuller on the stumps, comes on the front foot to defend
bowls this across him and he has a stab at it, gets a thickish outside edge but no power in the shot and the just trickles away towards gully
full on off, defended on the front foot
breaks sharply from outside off that time, but he goes deep in his crease and defends in front of his pads
fuller, some drift into him but he comes well forward to smother it
full outside off, gets him to lunge out to defend
length outside off, spinning in, he goes back and whips this to deep square leg
drags it short and he stays back to use his wrists and cut it nicely through point. Pujara sprints after it from cover to pull it back in
tossed up, defended towards point
that's some bite! On a length, and whizzes past the bat with sharp turn
fuller, pushed back to the bowler
speared in on off stump, very full, he gets his bat down in time to jab it towards cover
too full and invitingly tossed up, Maharaj plants his front foot down and smashes this down the ground. Eludes a diving Jadeja and goes into the long-off fence
length ball, moving inwards, tucked to one of the midwickets
this one dies on Saha. Outside off, very full, and he wanted to drive through cover but doesn't connect
gets it to move into the batsman who stabs it away towards mid-on
length ball in the channel, he watches it carefully as it goes past
tailing into him again, and he gets a thick inside edge while trying to push forward that goes to fine leg
tailing into him and rapped on the pads, but surely that was going down leg. The umpire thinks so too as Shami belts out an appeal
flighted outside off, driven to cover
given some air, full on off again, driven but cover dives to his left to stop it
length ball on off, stays back and punches it straight
angling into him, he stays inside the line while pushing defensively, gets an outside edge but the ball bounces well before slip
defended towards cover
fuller on the stumps, driven back to the bowler
wobble in the air for Shami, who gets it full outside off. Pitches and promptly dies on the way to Saha
smacked. Too short and just sat up, asking to be hit. Maharaj unleashes a fierce pull off the front foot and sends it to the square leg boundary
reverse swing again, tailing into him with a lovely straight seam, he stays still and behind the ball to defend
and that's some sharp movement into him again. Maharaj was rather late in jamming his bat down but got it there to block the ball
very confident stride forward to defend this outside off. This one was tailing in too
and that's a swinging yorker into his toes - Waqar-esque - but dealt with well in the end as Maharaj jams his bat down just in time to keep the ball out
full outside off, defended on the front foot
length outside off, Philander goes on the front foot and defends to gully
thwacked over mid-off. Full outside off and he gets only the end of the bat on it. There was a long-off in place
fuller on off, defended
angled into him, he stays beside the ball and defends, gets a thick edge that bounces to slip
skids through quicker and he just about jabs it out, gets an inside edge on it
good length and reverses in at off stump, prodded back to Shami
pitched further up and tails in on middle, Maharaj covers up in defence
bouncer on middle, aimed for the head, Maharaj ducks out of the way. Kohli likes it and applauds Shami from behind the stumps
full and homing in at off, opens the face and dinks it to point
back of a length and Shami explores the channel outside off, Maharaj doesn't
short on off, Maharaj gets right behind the line and defends competently
tossed outside off, firmly driven down to long-off
drifts in from around the wicket, then breaks away past the outside edge. The dip creates distance between bat and pitch, the turn takes it past the bat
pushed through and sliding in on middle, hacked over midwicket with the angle to the boundary
flatter and skidding into middle, Maharaj goes on the back foot and clips the ball away behind square on the leg side
straighter one from Jadeja, Philander reads it and defends to cover
speared wide of off, no shot from Philander
back of a length and swerves away off the pitch, against the angle, ignored
wide of the crease, on the hips, picked off through square leg
short, wide, moves further away, no shot from Philander
short and Shami hits the bat hard outside off, spliced to cover
full and reverses in at off, Philander keeps it out
overpitched and angling in on middle, Philander shows the full face of the bat and drives solidly straight of mid-on
shorter and spins away outside off, Maharaj tests out his shoulder and cracks it away between point and cover. Nice way to bring up the half-century stand
back of a length and spins away outside off, defended off the back foot
fuller and slower on off, blocked off the front foot this time
skids on outside off, no shot
big turn for Jadeja! Threatens to angle in towards off, then rips away past the outside edge
slider on off, poked out to point off the outside half of the bat
short and slanting in at middle, cramps the batsman for room, fended away to the leg side off the back foot
much fuller and seams back in from outside off, 141.1ks, teases off stump and runs through to Saha. Left alone
full and comes back in once again as Philander falls over and wears it on the pad
full, angling in at middle, straightens to take the outside edge and wander away to the off side
short and outside off, sails through to Saha, left alone. Saha takes it to the left in front of his face
full and wide - possibly wider than a set of stumps outside off - Philander reaches out for the ball and jabs it away behind point for four
fuller and outside off, holds its line, Maharaj fiddles with it, then belatedly tucks his bat inside the line, deflected to keeper
full and outside off, laced straight to Ashwin at short cover
too full and slanted down the leg side, away from the reach of Maharaj's flick
bouncer angling down the leg side, Maharaj ducks under it
back of a length and swings back in, Maharaj hops and ekes out an inside edge onto his pad
rare miss from Saha. The ball dips in front of him and beats him diving to his left. Full and slanting down the leg side, the batsman can't get bat onto the glance, Saha is beaten as well
good length at 136.1ks, rears up and surprises Philander. Takes the shoulder of the bat and rolls away behind square on the leg side
back of a length and bounces over middle as Maharaj has a big heave-ho...and misses
bouncer outside off, Maharaj ducks under it
short on middle, Maharaj hops and fends it off
back of a length and fizzes through outside off, Maharaj throws his bat at ball and does not make contact once again
much fuller on off, poked to short cover to close out the over
back of a length and around off, tip and run to cover. They take on Rohit's arm for a single
banged in short at the body, Maharaj fends it to the leg side and scampers across to the non-striker's end
fullish and just a shade outside off, ignored
floated full and outside off, driven to the left of short cover
full on the stumps, played back to the bowler
back of a length and angling in on middle, Philander loosens his grip and blocks to the off side
lifter at 131.1ks, aimed at the body, Maharaj gets into a tangle, looks away and cops a blow on the glove as he fends it away
another short ball, sails through to Saha, nothing doing from Maharaj
good length and angling in, drop and run to cover for one. Maharaj clutches his right shoulder after completing the single
bouncer outside off, Philander ducks under and avoids it
back of a length on off, Philander defends solidly
back of a length and keeps low outside off, no shot
full on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
back of a length and straightens outside off, jabbed to point with an open face
very full on middle, clipped with the angle to the right of midwicket
pitched up on off, Philander yells 'wait on' as he taps the ball to cover
full and on middle, driven straight of mid-on for an urgent single. They take on Philander's arm for a single
on a length and around off, Maharaj's bat comes down at an angle and an outside edge streaks away behind point
tossed up on off, defended to silly-point
pushed through outside off, driven to Jadeja's left to mid-off
tossed outside off, Philander plays with soft hands and defends
full on the stumps, pushed back to Jadeja
round-arm slider on middle, dead-batted away
slid in on middle, calmly defended
flighted on middle, played back to Ashwin
flatter and spins away in at off, Maharaj back away and stabs it away in the gap at cover
non-turner from Ashwin. Philander edges it past the right of first slip
slower offbreak, dips and turns, blocked to short leg
slightly overpitched and outside off, Maharaj leans into it and caresses it away straight of mid-off. So easy on the eye. Played, Maharaj
fired on off stump, blocked off the front foot
full and outside off, pushed to cover
shorter and breaks away outside off, chopped wide enough of extra-cover for one
drifts in from outside off, Philander gropes at it, the ball grips and turns sharply past the outside edge
round-arm dart on middle, Philander deploys a good stride and blocks
skidding in at off, inside-edged onto the pad
on a length and just a shade outside off, steered to point
dangled up, breaks back in on middle, stops on Maharaj, he goes on the back foot and jabs it back to Ashwin. Ashwin dives to his right from his followthrough and drops the return catch
shorter and outside off, utterly battered to the cover boundary off the back foot
full and spins in from outside off, defended
whipped away to the right of long-on. Maharaj - sore shoulder and all - brings up his maiden Test fifty
shorter, flatter, turns in at off, defended
dangled up on off, kept out
very full on the stumps, driven firmly back to Jadeja
good length, draws him forward to defend but not to the pitch of the ball, he plays it with soft hands, and it bounces a bit more than he expected, takes him on the glove
fuller, defended to gully with an angled bat
length on off, big stride forward to defend. There's half an appeal because it might have hit pad first, but would have been probably struck outside the line
full on the stumps, defended
very full, clipped off his toes to mid-on
too short and allows him to rock back and cut this powerfully. Didn't time it perfectly though so Pujara hares after it from cover and pulls it in just before the point fence
that's some sharp turn. Tossed up outside off and breaks big time, but he's coming across and although it strikes him on the pads the impact is well outside off
tossed up, pushed to cover
tossed up outside off, defended on the front foot towards gully. They realise there's no fielder there so steal a quick single even as slip scrambles after the ball and has a shy
tossed up outside off again, but this one doesn't spin back sharply and he eases through point
length on the stumps, goes deep in his crease and uses his wrists to flick off his pads through square leg
agriculture slog across the line, doesn't time it but has enough to clear Ashwin at mid-on, who runs back but can't reach the ball. Got a top edge on that, but a thick one
goes back and turns this to short leg
length ball, goes deep and shows the full face of the bat in defence
quickish, speared on a length and spinning away, but jabbed out
fuller, stretches out and defends to cover
strays on the pads and is flicked off the front foot to square leg. No fielder in the vicinity so they run a brisk two
nicely tossed up outside off, met with bat and pad, struck outside the line
more outside off that time, but he comes across and defends
tossed up, dips on him a bit, and he wanted to flick it but ends up toe-ending it back towards the bowler
fuller on off, defended on the front foot
tossed up well wide of off, he covers the line and lets it go through
good length outside off, lunges forward and keeps it out
length ball outside off, defended to cover
swinging into him, but on the pads, and flicked to backward square leg on the fence
back of a length outside off, pushed to cover
back of a length, gets it to rise a bit on off and pushes the batsman on the back foot. Defended into the offside from near his midriff
fuller on off, dead-batted to mid-off
swinging into him but he deals with it comfortably, blocking it into the offside
length on off, pushed towards extra cover
outside off that time and he leaves it alone
fuller on the stumps, shows his front foot defence
deftly done. Marginally short and a bit wide of off, he goes back and makes room to cut this with power through backward point
shorter and wider outside off, this time he just needs to stay put and slash it square for another boundary. century partnership between these two.
skids through on the stumps, he jams it to extra cover, where a surly looking Kohli fields it
oh peachy. Lovely extra cover drive. It was a nothing ball admittedly, half-volley at non-express pace outside off, but such fine execution, just leaned into the drive and held his shape
strays down leg, probably trying for extra pace
bouncer but well outside off, so it's easy for him to avoid
another bouncer, better directed this time but he ducks comfortably under it
back of a length outside off, steered to point
length on off, defended solidly to cover
length on the stumps, defended on the front foot
goes back to defend this and it bounces down on the ground and continues to go backwards, but goes over the stumps
pushed towards cover, they think about a single but the non-striker sends him back
skidder on the stumps, but he goes back and jams his bat down in time to keep it out
length ball on off, turning away, defended by going back, but not off the centre of the bat
fuller, makes him lunge out and drive to cover
some bite in the pitch again from a good length, spits up a bit and he has to fend it to keep it down
fuller on off, driven to mid-on, who is very straight and short
length outside off, defended on the front foot
fuller on off, stride out to defend
gets a bit more drift and Philander is sticking to his method of planting front foot down and defending, gets a bit of an inside edge that rolls to short leg
goes back and dead bats this
kept a bit low from a length on the stumps, but he was playing well back and managed to keep it out

given some more air, and it spins past his bat while he's looking to come on the front foot and defend. Gets an outside edge that is beyond a diving Rahane at first slip and runs into the third man boundary
length outside off, defended on the front foot
fuller on the stumps, walks into the drive to mid-off
tossed up on the stumps, fuller and he's able to pat the drive down to long-off
length on the stumps, solidly defended on the front foot
tossed up, full on off, but he goes back to it and taps it into the legside
tossed up, dipping on him as he comes on the front foot to defend, and it spins to take the inside edge onto pad
fuller on off, defended on the front foot

caught at leg slip A superb innings by Maharaj but Ashwin ends it. Gets some drift on this and it is on leg stump, Maharaj is looking to flick it away, gets a thin edge onto pad and straight to Rohit Sharma. The Indians are jubilant, but this has been a fantastic knock by Maharaj, with a sore shoulder too.
gets some drift into him from around the wicket and he's coming on the front foot to defend, gets an inside edge that runs to fine leg
fuller outside off, defended towards point
speared into him, defended on the front foot, short leg dives and plucks the ball and the fielders get excited about a catch, but it was a bump ball
defended into the offside

oh that one came out of nowhere! Pitched on a full length, Philander not quite to the pitch to defend, but it just hisses and spits off the pitch as it turns past the bat. Saha collects near his shoulders
defended into the offside on the front foot
fuller outside off, pushed on the front foot between cover and point

through him. Rabada goes for the drive outside off with feet static. India have gone for the review. Tossed up and spinning into him, Rabada seemed to have missed it entirely. And replays confirm that there is daylight between bat and pad. That was probably a review taken because India have two and South Africa are nine down
and there's some turn and bounce again. Pitches on a length and spins past his defensive prod and hits him in the midriff
goes well back and blocks it with a straight bat
tossed up on the stumps, stretches forward and defends
tossed up outside off, mows a drive down to long-on
drags it down short, and Rabada stays in his crease and defends
fuller, patted back down the pitch
fuller, gets his front leg out in front and bat close to it to defend
angling into him again, defended towards silly point
very full on middle and leg, and he's defended it again
quicker on the stumps, blocked towards silly point
skids through on the stumps on a length, dead batted
given some more air and a mite slower, but he shows the same forward defensive as always
nice loop and dip, pitches on middle but he defends solidly
ooh that's beaten him outside off. Tossed up again but outside off and whizzes past his bat
draws the edge that time but through the vacant gully region

given out lbw but Rabada is reviewing. That's only because they have a review left. It looked pretty plumb. And DRS confirms that's three reds, so that will end South Africa's innings. Nice loop from around the wicket, pitches on middle and leg and goes almost straight on. He's playing down the wrong line to defend, expecting it to turn, but it hits his pad. Would have crashed into leg stump.
oh my, that one came back in a long way. But safe enough to leave because it was going over the stumps. Not great for your mindset as a batsman when the first ball does that

Markram has a pair. What a start for India and Ishant. Markram is out almost the same way he was in the first innings, but to a different bowler. This one bent in sharply once again, but Ishant bowled it more full and straight than the first ball and Markram is struck on the pads. Was it going down? The umpire raises his finger after a loud appeal. They think about reviewing, but I suspect that would have been umpire's call on review.
another one jagging in sharply on a length, but de Bruyn gets well behind it and defends with a full face
length in the channel, left alone
back of a length outside off, left alone
sharp movement into him again, defended into the legside. Was a bit off balance while getting on the front foot for that. South Africa have begun very tentatively
length ball going across him and ends up in the channel, bunted back to the bowler
risky run. Length in the channel, he pushed it to point and took off for a run. If the fielder - Agarwal - had hit the stumps, de Bruyn was a goner. Scrambled minds from South Africa

edged through the slips. South Africa really need to gather themselves. And that is a drop by Virat Kohli at third slip. Was dipping on him after straightening on a length and drawing the edge, but Kohli lets it go through his fingers
length outside off, lets it go
length on the fifth stump line, and he thinks about playing it but pulls his bat out of the way well in time
swinging into him again, and runs to the third man boundary off another outside edge as it straightens off the pitch and runs between third slip and gully
movement away from Elgar, but well outside off so he doesn't need to play at that
back of a length outside off, left alone
extravagant movement away again, but well outside off and going further away
now gets it on the stumps and a bit fuller, Elgar defends it and it rolls towards mid-off from the outside half of the bat
length outside off again
fuller on the fifth stump, pushed towards mid-off on the front foot
that's a beautiful line, right in the channel, and he gets it to carry nicely to Saha from a length, moving slightly away from the batsman
good length in the channel again, and he lets it go
nice carry for Umesh, and he's keeping in that corridor outside off. The batsman's leaving it alone alright but is forced to watch it carefully
length on off, defended to point

lost his radar there after four excellent balls, or perhaps he was looking to set him up with an inswinger after all those balls going away. But it's too far down leg for even Saha to collect and runs down fine
back to nibbling at that off stump on a length, moving away a touch and de Bruyn defends solidly from the crease
length outside off, moving away. Elgar almost had a flash at it, but pulls out of the shot

between gully and third slip.That has been South Africa's most productive area this morning. But he was more in control of this one, presses forward with an angled bat and runs it down. Half edge, half steered
length on off, steered to point
dropped short of third slip. Another edge, with the ball straightening from outside off. Elgar going on a forward defensive and it takes the edge but clearly short of Kohli
stretches out for this one outside off and steers it between point and gully - but wasn't fully in control of that because it hung in the air. Runs are coming for South Africa but fairly riskily

and he bowls the one that goes with the angle after having taken them away from Elgar all over, but the batsman deals with it well enough, nudges it towards mid-on with bat in front of pad and weight on the front foot
significant movement away from him in the channel, left alone
swinging away from him but a touch fuller and he's able to defend it on off stump towards cover
shaping it away from the batsman nicely now Umesh, but de Bruyn's equal to it and defends to point

superman take from Saha flying to his left. De Bruyn will be filthy with himself. Umesh had strayed down leg and he tried to glance him fine. You just don't do that when it's Wriddhiman Saha behind the stumps. He has flown - there is no other word to accurately describe it - yards to his left and plucked that ball out. Whew.
way down legside and the batsman is not going to get anywhere near that
length ball in the channel, left alone
takes on the short ball, fetching the pull form over his shoulder outside off and gets only a toe-end on it. It's safe though, and clears midwicket
length outside off, steered to point's left
that moved in sharply. And good carry from a length too, outside off. Can safely leave it because it's well over the stumps
fuller on off, he stayed still in his crease and played it late, accounting for the swing. Just taps it down to fine leg using wrists and bottom hand, with minimal backlift or flourish
swinging into him again, he plays it late. Has he reduced his backlift to account for late swing? Perhaps he has. Ends up nudging it towards square leg
fuller on off, defended solidly to cover

sweet timing but pulled inside the point boundary by Agarwal. Wide of off stump and very full, he reaches for it with his hands and pings it past point. Wasn't exactly safe since it hung in the air a bit
length on the stumps, defended down the pitch
length on the stumps, pushed to mid-off. Jadeja is a bit wide but he swoops in like a hawk, and collects in one smooth motion
oh that reared up from a length outside off and surprised Faf. Well dealt with, quick reflexes to bring his bat up and fend it straight down
length but on the pads, tucked through midwicket
length outside off, left alone
fuller outside off, steered to point's left but he moves quickly to cut it off
strays on the pads and nicely timed by Elgar, who tucks it off his pads to the midwicket boundary
good length in the channel, left alone
strays on the pads again, flicked to square leg's right but Ashwin does well to dive to his right and save it
length ball angling into him, tucked to square leg
fuller and on middle stump, defended back to the bowler with a straight bat
too far down leg and he can't get near it while trying to glance
length ball but angling into his pads and he clips it through backward square leg
length ball angling into him, punched to cover
fuller but well outside off, left alone
strays down leg again and is flicked to fine leg
back of a length outside off, left alone

oh that's a nasty short ball. It reared up from back of a length and he was going for the pull but then decided to not go for it a little too late. Bangs into his bat and almost pings him on the grille. Popped up and dropped near him
good response by the batsman, given room outside off  and he carves it off the backfoot through backward point
lovely shot, half-volley outside off and he leans into the cover drive in elegant fashion
back of a length outside off, defended to cover
and third one for the over. Nice confident stride out to this one outside off and he leans forward, opens the face while driving and sends it racing through point
closer to the stumps this time and he pushes it back past Shami to mid-off
tossed up on off, he pushes forward and the ball runs past leg slip off the inside half of his bat
fuller on the stumps, worked backward of square
tossed up on a length, gets nicely behind it and goes deep in his crease to defend with the full face
fuller, lunges out and defends
that's pinged short leg Rohit Sharma the man there. Too short and he goes for the hard sweep, nails it too, but that's hit Rohit who was turning and taking evasive action. No damage done
loop, dip and turn, defeats his forward defensive and hits him on the pad. Loud appeal but maybe that ball was doing too much
full and slanting away outside off, Elgar carefully opens the face and glides it away behind point, to the right of the man square on the off side
Shami follows it with a bouncer on middle, Elgar ducks out of the way
another nasty bouncer, explodes off the pitch, top take from Saha once again. Wide called
muffled appeal for caught behind from Saha and Shami, umpire Llong shakes his head. Back of a length and angling across off, a crease-bound Elgar swishes...and does not make contact. No bat involved
much fuller, angling away, seaming away past the outside edge in the channel
back of a length and just a shade outside off, 139ks, Elgar stabs an inside edge to leg side
full and attacking the stumps, driven back to Shami
tossed up liberally and turns in at off, presses forward and defends
much slower and drops on off stump, blocked to short leg with soft hands
quicker and flatter on off, pushed back to the bowler
stock ball from Ashwin, dips and drifts, takes the leading edge and rolls towards cover
eased down to long-off
skids on outside off, jabbed back to the bowler
banged in short and slanting in at the top of off, fended back towards Shami off the back foot
on a length and angling in at off, Faf gets right behind the line and defends
full and hung up wide of off, Faf does not bite
back of a length and on a sixth-stump line outside off, Faf shoulders arms once again
much fuller and Shami brings this back in, not too far away from off stump, fairly tight leave from Faf. It barely carries to Saha behind the stumps, but he gets his body behind the ball and stops it

Shami closes out the over with a ripper! On a length, he brings it back in towards off, the angle tricks Faf but Shami gets it to straighten it away past the outside edge. Faf did well not to reach so far out for the ball in the channel
slower and flatter outside off, cracked straight to short cover
starts outside off and breaks away, no shot from Elgar
on a length and kicks up outside off, Elgar is wary of the extra bounce and lets it go through to Saha
back of a length and sliding down leg with the angle from round the stumps
darted on the pads, Elgar doesn't get enough bat on the flick as the ball dribbles away to short fine leg

there's the sucker ball from Ashwin. Dangled up outside off, breaks away further, lures Elgar into a big drive away from the body. He can't touch it - beaten by sharp turn - Saha is beaten as well as the ball sneaks away to the boundary. Rahane is beaten to his right at slip too
good length and on a fifth-stump line outside off, more confident leave from Faf
shorter and Shami hits the deck hard, just a shade outside off, Faf stands up tall and inside-edges the ball to the leg side
on a length and seaming in at off stump, can't breach Faf's compact defences
on a length and straightens just outside off, no shot from Faf
pitched up and Shami encourages Faf to drive from outside off. The SA captain, though, isn't interested
banged in short and slanting in at off, Faf gets up on his tippy toes and fends it off
pushed through and angling in at off stump, solidly played back to Ashwin
much fuller and spins away just a shade outside off, Elgar bends forward in defence
slower through the air and drifts towards the pads, worked away past the left of mid-on

Ashwin belts out an appeal for lbw, not given. Kohli challenges the on-field not-out decision. Reckon Faf got outside the line while venturing the sweep. Pushed through fuller and spins back in  , Faf does not make contact with the sweep. The tracker returns umpire's call on impact. Gaffney's decision is upheld in the end
defended with the break to the left of short leg
looped up and breaks in at off, Faf deploys a good stride and blocks to the leg side
speared full and attached with width outside off, Elgar doesn't need any second invitations. Creams it away to the right of Ashwin at extra-cover
tossed outside off, Elgar aims another cover drive but the bat turns in his hands and he sends an inside edge to the leg side
slower through the air and spins in at off, Elgar bends forward and defends carefully
dragged down outside off, Elgar jumps back and forces the ball to midwicket
fuller on off, forward and dead-batted away by Elgar
pushed through and breaks back in, blocked to short leg
back of a length and turns in on middle, Faf goes back and tickles it to square leg
on a length and drifts away outside off, beating the outside edge
flatter and spins in on off, blocked off the front foot
looped up on off, dips, Faf does not get close enough to the pitch and inside-edges it onto the pad
on a length and faster on off, Faf opts to jab it to the off side off the back foot
speared on off once again, Faf gets right behind the line and plays it back to Ashwin
looped up on off, driven down to long-on
sliding in at 92ks, all shoulder in this ball, whisked away to cover
much slower on off, poked away to the right of slip
shortish and at the pads, deflected to short fine leg
Elgar gets half-forward and works it with the break to midwicket

Bat-pad catch? Umpire Llong shakes his head. On a length and turns back in from outside off, Elgar is caught on the crease and he wafts at the ball. Off the pad-flap and lobs up. Rahane throws himself to his right from slip and grabs the ball
fired on off stump, dead-batted away
Faf gets forward, gets outside the line, and defends
back of a length and turning in on middle, defended to short leg
Faf shuffles outside the line, sweeps flat and hard. Rohit takes evasive action at short leg and cops a blow on the shin
pushed through and spins in on off, Faf covers up in defence
Elgar now jumps outside the line of off, aims a sweep, but does not get it away
shorter and outside off, extra bounce from the rough, Elgar flaps the ball away to midwicket
very full, swept from the stumps to long leg
Jadeja shifts his lines wider, non-turner on a fifth-stump line, blocked
flatter, back of a length, angling in, then breaks away past the outside edge. Some extra bounce to boot
fuller on the stumps, played back to the bowler
on a length and drifts in on off stump, watchfully defended by Elgar

Ashwin lobs it up outside off, Elgar reaches out for the ball and drives through the line. The throw from the outfield is to Ashwin, who swerves away from the ball, instead of grabbing it and hitting the stumps. India end up conceding overthrows

Whoa! Has Saha pouched it on the rebound? Faf has been given out caught behind. Ashwin tosses an offbreak, gets it to turn in, Faf inches forward, prods at it and inside-edges it onto the pad. It dies on Saha. One. Two. Three... Saha plunges forward and takes it on the fourth attempt inches from the ground.
on a length and spins in, defended
slides on outside off, beaten on the outside edge
Ashwin gives this loads of air, Bavuma gets outside the line, the ball balloons off the pad to silly-point
fuller on off, jabbed away to the leg side
flatter on off, defended
whipped away with the break to deep square leg
round-arm dart from Jadeja, blocked on middle
fuller and just a shade outside off, pushed to cover off the front foot
much slower through the air on off, Bavuma presses forward in defence
fullish and outside off, driven through the line to short cover

Ooops, what was that, Elgar? It worked for him in Vizag, here he holes out to mid-off running back. Umesh just about clings onto the catch on the third attempt. Ashwin loops it up on off, dips and turns. Elgar isn't quite close enough to the pitch and winds up slicing the ball as opposed to lofting it. He was aiming to hit it over mid-on, but Umesh grabs it on the rebound from mid-off. Sixth in the game for Ashwin
flatter and drifts outside off, defended off the back foot
tossed on off, forward and dead-batted
wide of the crease, slider on off, prodded through the covers
full and dips at off, de Kock keeps it out
tossed up and spins back in, Quinton chips it off the inside half but to the right of Rohit at short leg
tossed on off, played to silly-point with soft hands
slower through the air and drifts at off stump, Bavuma gets behind the line and defends
fuller and just a shade outside off, jabbed down to mid-off
tossed and outside off, driven to mid-off once again
flighted on the stumps, defended on the front foot
nice loop, makes him stretch out and defend on off stump
inviting the drive and he goes for it, gets a thick outside edge which goes wide of second slip.
nicely tossed up and dipping on middle stump, but he does well to lunge out and get to the pitch to smother the spin
a bit fuller outside off, steered towards point
