and the dip and turn almost defeated him there, was not pushing forward enough, and gets it off the shoulder of the bat, but played softly enough that it plops down short of the close-in fielders
fuller, drifting on the pads, gets on the front foot and pushes softly to the bowler's right to steal a quick single

goes for the big slog-sweep and stumps rattled. Some sharp turn from outside off on a length. Quinton wanted to bash it into oblivion. There is no deep midwicket so he thought the shot is on. But he connected only with air, while the ball connects with the stumps.
fuller on off, gets behind it and defends
length ball, keeps it on off, and Muthusamy is already in a defensive position and blocks it
length ball stays in his crease that time and defends
again with that forward defence. His back leg splays out well beyond off stump so he looks off balance but he manages to get behind it and block solidly
length outside off, he stays back and punches to extra cover
nicely tossed up on off and he comes forward to smother it
and there's the ball that tempts him into the drive. Pleasing loop and dip, breaks sharply after pitching. Muthusamy goes for the booming drive, doesn't connect
and that one spits up after pitching on a length, goes past his outside edge but he's got the bat tucked right beside pad inside the line
another one kicks up from a length and spins past the outside edge
fuller this time on the stumps and those previous balls have made his footwork a bit uncertain but he manages to jam the bat down in time to keep it out
length ball on the stumps, turning away but enough time to get behind it and defend
fuller on the stumps, stays in his crease and blocks
good length and gets it to bounce a bit extra, awkwardly fended off his waist towards square leg
gives him the charge and executes perfectly. Gets to the pitch of the ball and hits a sweet shot over mid-off and into the boundary
fuller, given air, defended on the front foot
good length on middle, doesn't spin as much as he though and takes the inside edge of  his forward defensive to roll to square leg
nicely done, tossed up and drawing him forward but it dips well before he can get to the pitch of it and breaks in to rap him on the pads
fuller on off, punched along the ground on the front foot through cover
angling into him, a bit fuller, he stretches out to defend
there's the sucker ball for the drive outside off, and he connects with it. pings Rohit Sharma at silly point on his ankle and has him hobbling. Rohit's hurt his left ankle.
tossed up closer to off stump, he tries to drive it again, but misses it
another one invitingly tossed up around off and he gets on the front foot for a confident drive through cover, along the ground
length on off, defended gently
outside off, defended into the offside
too short and wide outside off, but Bavuma not tempted to get bat anywhere near it, just lets it go
good length on off, defended carefully towards cover
and that one spins a bit more and beats his outside edge. Pitched on a length, Bavuma was on the front foot to defend
too full and he unfurls a nice looking cover drive but can't beat the man at short cover
gets some drift into him and ends up fullish on leg stump, defended by getting behind it
and pulls the line marginally straigther, on middle stump now but defended solidly just the same
probing one, flighted on the stumps, but defended on the front foot again
some bite this time, and outside off, hisses up and Saha collects well above his waist. Muthusamy leaves it alone
fuller on the stumps, driven to mid-off
tossed up on off, defended to silly point
past the outside edge again. Pitches on a length and jags away sharply with good bounce too
fuller, patted back to the bowler
skips down the track and gets close to the ball to tuck it wide of mid-on
too full outside off and driven firmly but hits the shin pads of silly point - Mayank the man there
fuller outside off, defended
sharp turn inside him from back of a length, he's coming across and wears it on his pads
lovely shot. Ashwin errs, not done it often, but Temba capitalises. Too short and wide outside off, and cut away beautifully through backward point
a little short still and he goes on the back foot to steer to backward point
tossed up outside off and he goes to sweep, but misses. Hits his pads but impact is outside off
quicker one outside off, he comes forward to defend
sharp turn now, slower and more air, pitches on off and breaks so much that it beats Saha down the legside. The angle also helped, with Ashwin having gone wide of the crease
wide of the crease again, fuller and angling in on off, he stretches forward and defends
too short and spinning into him, jabbed towards extra cover from the crease
fuller outside off, opens the face of the bat to steer to point's left
another one hisses past the outside edge. Third time that has happened for Jadeja to Bavuma. Turning sharply from a length
tossed up but too full and he unfurls a super looking cover drive, plays it from the crease, gets on one knee and creams it through the offside
hits the back of length area again from which he's got sharp turn, but this is a little too short and the batsman has enough time to defend
fuller outside off, big stride out to defend towards cover-point
fuller, driven to extra cover
and that is a ball you can't do much about, loops up and dips on him, turns enough to take the shoulder of the bat but drops short of the close in fielders
length on middle spinning away but he defends solidly
went through straight on outside off, but he was not interested in playing it anyway

tossed up again inviting the drive, and Muthusamy nails it, smokes it through cover point with a nice big stride and using his hands to go through with the shot while opening the face of the bat a bit
and that's the bowler's comeback - kicks off a length and spins viciously past his outside edge by a long way, beating him completely
tossed up and gets this on the right length, Bavuma is going forward to deend and it gets the edge, but falls just short of Rahane at second slip and goes through him
fuller, defended down the pitch
full outside off, comes on the front foot to defend to silly point
goes with the arm that one and hits him on the pad, but the angle would have taken it down leg
good length but good forward defensive with a confident stride forward
marginally short and Bavuma rocks back to create the space to pull this over midwicket and into the fence. Oh hello, that's actually carried all the way! It's a six
drifts too far on the pads and is clipped through square leg
given air outside off, defended into the offside on the front foot
nice take by Rahane at slip off Muthusamy's pad. Length outside off and he was padding it away. Rahane dived to his left and took it
fuller, defended back to the bowler
full toss, slapped straight to mid-off
fuller on off, defended to mid-off
length ball but on the pads, tucked to deep square leg
and some shape in the air going inwards, takes the inside edge down to fine leg as he goes half-cock in his forward defensive
length ball outside off, steered to point
length ball angling into him, patted to mid-on
length all angling into him on off stump, Muthusamy stays in his crease and calmly blocks it back to Shami
snakes past the outside edge. Beautifully bowled, moving across him on a length, and defeats his forward defensive and just past the edge
fuller on off, defended on the front foot
fuller outside off, padded away with a big stretch
stayed back this time to a length ball but dealt with it well, tapping it down towards the legside
tossed up outside off he tucks bat behind pad and lets it go through to the keeper while lunging out
fuller, clipped off his toes to mid-on's right
just loops up over the short leg. Muthusamy wasn't expecting that line perhaps, tossed up on leg and he gets an inside edge onto pad that goes over the fielder and falls safe
length outside off, and he walks into the shot, opens the bat face and controls it well, running it through backward point for a boundary. Well timed
back of a length and climbing into him, fended awkwardly to square leg off his midriff. The fielder is deep so they sneak a second run
fuller outside off, crisp cover drive with a big stride out but can't beat the fielder at cover
back of a length on off, defended solidly back to Shami
a bit too straight, tailing into the pads and tucked through midwicket
length ball on the stumps, blocked back to the bowler

huge appeal by Jadeja as Bavuma misses the sweep and Kohli reviews. Pitches on off and is turning away, I think Bavuma will be saved by the impact, and that might miss the stumps too. And in fact that's exactly what has happened. That's a poor review. Impact well outside off and turning further away so it's inevitably missing off by a long way too

Rahane pulls off a stunner at slip forget that review off the previous ball, Bavuma's gone now. Tossed up and Bavuma is drawn into the drive, but it drifts and turns, clips his outside edge and goes very fine. Excellent reflexes by Rahane who sticks out his left hand near shoulder height and then the right hand closes around the ball too to ensure it doesn't pop out anywhere - all while diving to his left.
flighted just a shade outside off, Philander plants his front foot and drives strongly to short cover
pushed through on off, Philander presses forward and defends
tossed just a shade outside off, guided just wide of point
pushed through and spins in on off from over the stumps, Jadeja can't breach Muthusamy's defences
good length and swerves back in, catches Philander in the crease, inside-edged onto the pad as Philander weathers the lbw shout
Shami nearly rips off the glove! 141.2ks, prancing delivery, Philander looks away and fends at it. Pings the glove and drops it in front of short midwicket
wide of the crease, slanting in at off, this length ball is blocked to short midwicket
overpitched and outside off, Philander drills a drive through the covers

Fended to second slip! This is a snorter from Shami. Back of a length, angling in from round the stumps, then kicks away outside off. Not too dissimilar from the Nortje dismissal - except Muthusamy is a left-hander. You can't do anything but fend at it, hoping it doesn't carry. This, however, flies through to Rohit. India three away from securing the series
greets Maharaj with a fiery lifter, Maharaj ducks out of the way
slides on outside off, no shot
Bam! For a change, Jadeja tosses it on middle, Philander gets underneath the length and muscles it down the ground for six
This is even better and bigger. Jadeja gives this air too, smoked from outside off to the midwicket boundary. Hit against the break
pushed through flatter and quicker outside off, defended off the front foot
angling into middle, full, dead-batted
knocked into the leg side for one
shorter and outside off, Philander jumps back and splices it in front of square on the off side
bouncer, angling across off, Maharaj sways his upper body out of the way. Wide called
banged down the leg side, Maharaj ducks under once again
short and outside off, Maharaj avoids it

Shami spins around for an lbw appeal. Rohit gesticulates that height may be an issue here. Wide of the crease, on a length and skids back in and raps the pad in front of middle and leg. But the sharp angle from over the stumps might have taken the ball down the leg side. India decide against a review
shorter and outside off, Maharaj gets on top of the bounce and punches in front of square for one
flatter and outside off, forced off the back foot to cover
back of a length on off, punched to mid-off off the back foot for one
pushed through and sliding in at leg stump, played back to Jadeja
fuller and hint of spin for Jadeja, run away to point
floated up on off, defended into the covers off the front foot
arm ball from wide of the crease, inside-edged onto the pad. Okay, replays suggest pad-first and India missed a trick by not reviewing it. The tracker has returned three reds
bouncer on middle, the batsman ducks under it
back of a length and angling in at the top of off, Maharaj gets behind the line and defends solidly
shorter and outside off, Maharaj sways his upper body out of the way
back of a length and skidding in at middle, Maharaj shuffles across and defends
much fuller on off, Maharaj reads the change in length and defends well once again
fended off an inside edge with the angle down to long leg
floated up and angling in on middle, defended off the front foot
shorter and on off, chopped from there to backward point off the back foot

Dropped! Dropped by Pujara at second slip. He stretches one hand, scoops it up in the air, Rahane is in the way at first slip. Neither can get to the ball. Jadeja found some turn and the outside edge but it doesn't translate into reward
Jadeja pulls his length back, drifts in from around the stumps and breaks away past the outside edge. Some extra bounce to boot too
non-turner outside off, left alone
fuller and outside off, ignored
short and outside off, chopped to point
full and spins on off, played back to Ashwin
full, starts outside off, slow turn for Ashwin, defended to short leg on the bounce
fired outside off, left alone
full and spins in on off, Philander looses his grip and jabs it down onto the pitch
popped in the air, but doesn't carry to short leg or leg slip
flighted on middle, Maharaj stretches out in defence
fizzes from a length outside off, the extra bounce defeats Maharaj's cut. Burst off the deck
full and zips back in on middle, all shoulder on this from Jadeja, blocked
hint of turn for Jadeja, Maharaj offers no shot and the ball nearly shaves off stump
driven through the line, but silly-point is in the way
full on off, played back to the bowler off the front foot
shorter and outside off, slashed through the gap at cover
shorter and bounces outside off, Maharaj has a crack at it and top-edges a cut down to the third-man fence
wide of the crease, slower through the air and turns in, watchfully defended off the back foot
big turn for Ashwin. Breaking down the leg side, no shot
wide of the crease, flatter and shorter outside off, Maharaj goes on the back foot and lashes it away behind point
wide of the crease, sliding down leg from a length, no shot
darted in on middle from around the wicket, stabbed off the back foot to midwicket
much fuller on off, kept out
tossed up on middle and spins away, Philander aims to lift it over cover, instead slices off the outside half. Does not carry to point
shorter and outside off, punched off the back foot for one
slides on outside off, dropped into the covers
full and outside off, driven to the left of mid-off
starts outside off and breaks in at off, Maharaj defends off the back foot
defended with the spin to short leg
tossed on off, Maharaj stretches out and plays it to midwicket
sharp turn for Ashwin, Maharaj is up to the challenge, loosens his grip and defends in front of short leg
faster offbreak, defended to short leg again on the bounce
dangled up on off stump, Maharaj is forward to dead-bat it
pushed through outside off, this non-turner is defended to silly-point
flat on off, defended to the left of silly-point this time
shorter and just a shade outside off, punched to the off side
fuller on the pads, dinked to the leg side
tossed outside off, patted to the covers
pushed through outside off, defended off the back foot
floated on a length, worked to the leg side off the back foot
pushed through outside off, Maharaj flashes and misses the outside edge
sharply spins in from outside off, Maharaj gets outside the line and takes it on the pad
Maharaj shuffles across and clips it with the break to square leg
back of a length and outside off, defended off the back foot
dropped short and wide outside off, Ashwin allows the batsman to go back and cut it through the cover-point region
slower offbreak, drops on off, defended off the front foot
back of a length and turns in, Philander yanks his bottom hand off the bat and blocks off the back foot
wide of the crease, sliding in on middle, forced off the back foot to midwicket
carrom ball? Heading down the leg side, tickled away fine on its way
length ball on middle, blocked to short leg
short, wide, cracked off the back foot to the off-side sweeper
full and outside off, squeezes out a drive to mid-off
flatter and just a shade outside off, blocked back off the back foot
tossed outside off, played up to cover
back of a length and on off, stabbed back to Rohit off the back foot
whipped to the right of short leg
flighted on off, eased down to long-off
looped up outside off, pushed back to the bowler
Ashwin lobs it up outside off, Philander likes the flight and crunnnnnnches it through the covers off the front foot
back of a length on off, defended back to the bowler
full on off, Philander bends forward in defence
full on off, driven to mid-off off the front foot
flighted on off, defended back to Jadeja
arm ball from Jadeja, defended off the back foot on off stump
full and drifting on on middle, off the inside half and rolls to square leg
shorter and turns away outside off, left alone
sliding down leg, away from the reach of Maharaj's flick
tossed on off, Maharaj stretches out and pushes it back to the left of Jadeja
low full toss floated well wide of off, and he lets it go
wide of the crease and short, at 101 kph, coming into him, jammed back to the bowler
okay Philander has had enough of a sighter of Kohli. Full toss well outside off again and he stretches out to lean into a cover drive that beats cover
and that brings out the yorker from Kohli, but not quick enough to trouble the batsman, who defends it out
another yorker, dug back out
high full toss, punched to mid-on
down leg, flicks pad on the way to Saha. Muted appeal
length on off stumps, solidly defended back to the bowler
short of a length not rising too much, but also down leg. He misses the pull
bouncer on off stump now, but pitched very short and he spots it very early and ducks under
oooh, play and a miss. Good length in the corridor, he goes for the big booming drive but doesn't connect
hammered. Too short outside off, just sits up and Maharaj cracks a pull shot in front of square. Made a bullet sound while leaving the bat
tossed up on the stumps, defended solidly
length, straying on the pads, clipped to fine leg
tossed up around off, he comes on the front foot and pushes it to mid-off's left
speared in on the stumps, defended from the crease
carves it through point by opening the bat face while on the front foot
floated up on leg stump, comfortably defended on the front foot
tailing in late at good pace and strikes him on the toes. Goes up in appeal but that would have comfortably gone down leg. In fact he got an inside edge onto pad too
length on off, stays back and punches to mid-off
trying to bring it into him but gets it to tail in too much and he's bowled this on a middle stump line so it goes down leg
getting good movement but wrong lines - down leg again
length on off, stays in his crease and punches off the back foot towards extra cover
and another one far down leg. Umesh hasn't sorted his lines in this new spell
length on middle stump, gets his front foot out beside the ball and defends
fuller, stays in his crease, weight on front foot to defend towards silly point
length on off, spinning away, glided towards backward point
length on middle stump, turning away but he gets beside it and uses an angled bat to keep it down
fuller on the stumps, bunted back to the bowler. Goes through Jadeja's fingers so they steal a single

jaffa. one of the rare balls he's given good air to, pitches on the perfect in-between spot where the batsman's front-foot stride won't get him to the pitch and then grips and breaks sharply past the outside edge

incredibly that line down legside works for Umesh. Second time in this innings. He was not getting his lines right in the past over, and he continues this over by starting with one down leg. Philander wants to tickle it fine but gets a faint edge. Saha is moving across to his left well and pouches it easily.
good length going across him, in the channel and left alone. The exact same ball he bowled to the right-hander, was a bad one (never mind the wicket). It's a good one to the left-hander
going across him, ends up on off stump, jabbed to cover
bouncer, doesn't rise up very high but Rabada spotted it early and ducked

full outside off, swinging away from him but Rabada gets the timing perfect on this. Well balanced, even though hands are going away from body to play this short arm jab of a cover drive that screams through extra cover

smart take by Rohit at second slip In the corridor from wide of the crease and perhaps straightens a touch. Rabada was caught in two minds, went to poke at it, wanted to then pull his bat away but was far too late to do that and it ended up just hanging there as the ball kissed the edge and travelled to Rohit, who took it low in front of him
fuller on the stumps, driven back firmly to Jadeja

given lbw but Maharaj has reviewed. Pitched it slightly shorter of a length and went with the arm but was it going down leg? No edge. And it's three reds on DRS so India have won by an innings and 137 runs and sealed the series. Struck in front of middle and leg, and going on to hit the stumps.
